snippet: We trust our Government has already made application to the Spanish authorities of Cuba, for the release of the Americans who are confined at Havana. We have no claims for their sur render. They were taken in arms against the Government of Cuba. T...
lead_paragraph: We trust our Government has already made application to the Spanish authorities of Cuba, for the release of the Americans who are confined at Havana. We have no claims for their sur render. They were taken in arms against the Government of Cuba. Thoey had divested them selves of their American citizenship before theyleft.
